column5: With the cold weather coming, it may have been my last trip for the year...      Although I am not putting the boat away just yet!!  My brother and I headed out to Pitcon again yesterday.. It was not like last weekend, that was a trip of a lifetime.. And I was not expecting to go 14 for 17 again..  We did manage to go 3 for 5 and the weather was AWESOME to top it off..  Started with a 9.5lb baby..    Then a 10..    And one more ten..    We lost the second and the last fish.. OH WELL.. All fish came on planners, the dippsy's did not fire off once all day..  Hopefully I'll be able to get out there one more time, if not, it was a fine way to end the fall..  I guess it's time to BRING ON THE ICE!!!!    Oooooops.. How did this pic get in here??    Can't wait to chase these bad boys around next year!!  RSB!!
Great report.  BOQ is truly an awesome fishery.
Great report and nice looking eyes!!  BOQ was great on Saturday...couldn't believe the weather we had.  I cant wait til next spring/summer as well....looks like it's gonna be a long winter!!!
Nice report..  Funny, we experienced the opposite, almost all dipsey fish.  Your buds got quite the grip on that 10lber.
Great way to end the season!!
~~~~Great post Bud, I was down there on Saturday, and did well also
way to go guys ,the weather was great,we did ok as well,and there was not to much boat traffic
awesome report dude! I'm thinkin maybe I should move to the east side of the GTA! haha  That BOQ seems like the place to be!!!  Cheers, uf
Excellent pics RSB. You and your bro have hot hands for Quinte walleye.
